name: codar2netcdf
raw_recipe:
package:
    name: codar2netcdf
    version: 0.0.1

source:
    fn: codar2netcdf-0.0.1.tar.gz
    url: https://pypi.python.org/packages/source/c/codar2netcdf/codar2netcdf-0.0.1.tar.gz
    md5: 17f18a793ccd16330f53e67174d0d8bb

build:
    number: 0
    script: python setup.py install --single-version-externally-managed --record record.txt

requirements:
    build:
        - python
        - setuptools
    run:
        - python
        - pandas
        - netcdf4
        - pytz
        - python-dateutil

test:
    imports:
        - codar2netcdf
        - codar2netcdf.tests
    requires:
        - pytest

about:
    home: https://github.com/axiom-data-science/codar2netcdf
    license: MIT License
    summary: 'A utility to convert CODAR total ASCII files into CF NetCDF files.'

extra:
    recipe-maintainers:
        - ocefpaf
        - kwilcox

about.summary: A utility to convert CODAR total ASCII files into CF NetCDF files.
